message.content:
cs.MM, cs.CV, cs.IT, cs.SI, cs.LG

The paper deals with motion estimation and compensation techniques commonly used in video processing and compression systems. This topic is closely related to computer vision (cs.CV) and multimedia (cs.MM) research areas. The paper also involves theoretical modeling and analysis of the motion-compensated prediction error, which requires knowledge of information theory (cs.IT) and signal processing (cs.SI). Additionally, the paper proposes two constructions of a separable autocorrelation function, which involves statistical learning (cs.LG) techniques. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.MM and cs.CV, followed by cs.IT, cs.SI, and cs.LG.
